Uses of Interface
org.cojen.tupl.Transaction

  • Packages that use Transaction 
    Package Description
    org.cojen.tupl
    See Database to get started with Tupl.
    org.cojen.tupl.ext
    Support for database extensions.

      static Transaction Transaction.BOGUS
      Transaction instance which isn't a transaction at all.
      Methods in org.cojen.tupl that return Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transaction WrappedCursor.link()
      Returns the transaction the cursor is currently linked to.
      Transaction Cursor.link()
      Returns the transaction the cursor is currently linked to.
      Transaction WrappedCursor.link(Transaction txn)
      Link to a transaction, which can be null for auto-commit mode.
      Transaction Cursor.link(Transaction txn)
      Link to a transaction, which can be null for auto-commit mode.
      default Transaction Database.newTransaction()
      Returns a new Transaction with the default durability mode.
      Transaction Database.newTransaction(DurabilityMode durabilityMode)
      Returns a new Transaction with the given durability mode.
      Methods in org.cojen.tupl with parameters of type Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean View.delete(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Unconditionally removes the entry associated with the given key.
      long Index.evict(Transaction txn, byte[] lowKey, byte[] highKey, Filter evictionFilter, boolean autoload)
      Select a few entries, and delete them from the index.
      default byte[] View.exchange(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Unconditionally associates a value with the given key, returning the previous value.
      default boolean View.insert(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Associates a value with the given key, unless a corresponding value already exists.
      Transaction WrappedCursor.link(Transaction txn)
      Link to a transaction, which can be null for auto-commit mode.
      Transaction Cursor.link(Transaction txn)
      Link to a transaction, which can be null for auto-commit mode.
      default byte[] View.load(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Returns a copy of the value for the given key, or null if no matching entry exists.
      LockResult View.lockCheck(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Checks the lock ownership for the given key.
      LockResult View.lockExclusive(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Explicitly acquire an exclusive lock for the given key, denying any additional locks.
      LockResult View.lockShared(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Explicitly acquire a shared lock for the given key, denying exclusive locks.
      LockResult View.lockUpgradable(Transaction txn, byte[] key)
      Explicitly acquire an upgradable lock for the given key, denying exclusive and additional upgradable locks.
      Cursor View.newCursor(Transaction txn) 
      default boolean View.remove(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Removes the entry associated with the given key, but only if the given value matches.
      default boolean View.replace(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Associates a value with the given key, but only if a corresponding value already exists.
      default void View.store(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] value)
      Unconditionally associates a value with the given key.
      default LockResult View.tryLockExclusive(Transaction txn, byte[] key, long nanosTimeout)
      Explicitly acquire an exclusive lock for the given key, denying any additional locks.
      default LockResult View.tryLockShared(Transaction txn, byte[] key, long nanosTimeout)
      Explicitly acquire a shared lock for the given key, denying exclusive locks.
      default LockResult View.tryLockUpgradable(Transaction txn, byte[] key, long nanosTimeout)
      Explicitly acquire an upgradable lock for the given key, denying exclusive and additional upgradable locks.
      default boolean View.update(Transaction txn, byte[] key, byte[] oldValue, byte[] newValue)
      Associates a value with the given key, but only if the given old value matches.
